body:
## Summary
- Implemented the missing FASTA export functionality in the BatchExport component
- Resolved TODO comment at line 224 in src/lib/BatchExport.svelte

## Changes
- Added imports for file storage utilities and FASTA parsing functions
- Implemented `exportCorrectedFasta` function that:
  - Retrieves the original file content from IndexedDB storage
  - Parses the FASTA content using existing validation utilities
  - Formats the sequences with proper line wrapping (60 characters)
  - Exports the file with an appropriate filename suffix (_exported.fasta)

## Technical Notes
The datareader analysis results don't contain corrected sequence data - they only store metadata about the sequences. Therefore, the implementation exports the original FASTA content from the stored file, which is the most appropriate solution given the current data structure.

## Test Plan
- [ ] Upload a FASTA file and run a datareader analysis
- [ ] Navigate to the batch export section
- [ ] Select the datareader analysis
- [ ] Verify that the FASTA export function works correctly
- [ ] Check that the exported file contains the expected sequences
title: Implement FASTA export functionality in BatchExport component
